lines: ### 40 TSHEPA O THEETSE
АН 223 CH 582
TRUST AND OBEY
Ge re sepela le Morena leseding,
Kgalalelo tumišo tseleng;
Re dire that' wa 'Gwe o tlo ba le rena,
Ge re tshepa gape re mokwa;
Pušološo:
Tshep 'o theetse ga
go tselapedi ya go thaba
Moreneng, Ka ntle le go mokwa;
Ga go na moriti, ga go na le leru,
Go myemyela ga 'Gwe di toge;
Ga go okaokwe ga go na poifo,
Tšohle re tshepa re Mokwa;
Ga go na morwalo ga go na manyami,
Eupša tšohle o di lefile;
Ga go na sello le go selekega,
Go kaone ge re tshepa re kwa
Ga re na sešupo sa rato la gagwe,
Ge re sešo re lahle tšohle;
Toko a re bontshe, Lethabo a re fe,
Tšohle go ba tshepang ba kwa;
Le go mo direleng, Re dule dinaong,
Go ba re sepele le yena,
A laele re dire, A rome re yentshe,
Re se tšhoge, Re kwe re tshepe;
